title: News for August 2018
content:
[[=]]
**« [[[news-07-2018|July 2018]]] | __[[[news-08-2018|August 2018]]]__ | [[[news-09-2018|September 2018]]] »**
[[/=]]

[[div style="border: 2px solid black; background-color: Moccasin;"]]
= The dynamic nature of this wiki means that linked pages might get moved, renamed, deleted, or replaced. Old news pages remain as time capsules and are not updated to account for these changes.
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]
#header h2 span {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 19px 0;
    line-height: 0px;
    max-height: 0px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}

#header {
    background-image: url(http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news/SCPNewsLogo);
}

#header h2 span::before {
    color: #eee;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #f0f0c0;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #000;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.8);
    content: 'Site Correspondence Periodical';
}
[[/module]]

We're doing a bunch of new things for this month's Site News! Changes include a revamped Fan-content area, a contest recap, and an editor's choice section! Feedback on all of these things would be greatly appreciated, so please let us know in the comments what you think about it.

Before we start though, I just want to give a huge thank you to TSATPWTCOTTTADC and Uncle Nicolini, without whom none of this would have been possible. Seriously, they're amazing.

[[size 75%]]This is a series showing off news from the site, articles from the past month[[footnote]] with a rating above 0 [[/footnote]], and fan-content for you to check out and discover! Be sure to leave a comment with your thoughts![[/size]]

++++* Fandom Stuff
* [[[scp-oct-hub| SCP OCT Hub]]] - In the void left by March Madness, a new unofficial site arena has opened up. Original Characters vs Original Characters, the ultimate showdown of ultimate destiny and Posting has begun. Organized by PeppersGhost.
* [[[scp-series-5| SCP Series 5]]] - The 4000 contest has finally concluded (check out the post-game stats page below) and Series 5 is finally open to contributions! Get out there and start making articles!

++++* Event Featured Articles

This month had no theme! Instead, winners from the previous [[[Doomsday Contest]]] got their articles featured! Check them out below!

++++* Featured Articles

* The featured articles for August were [[[SCP-3379]]] ("D-11424 and the Arctic Meat Hole of Infinite Wonders") by Darkstuff and Weryllium, [[[SCP-3564]]] ("The Immortal Bard, Act Ⅱ: Return of Shakespeare") by MaliceAforethought, [[[SCP-3934]]] ("For Sale: Loch Ness Monsters") by Modern_erasmus, and [[[Parts]]] by Fieldstone.
 * In [[[SCP-3379]]], D-11424, inter-dimensional free-man, is put through a series of challenges, possibly for the right to his kidneys. I'm not sure though, don't speak walrus.
 * In [[[SCP-3564]]], Shakespeare comes back from the dead to do...something. Certainly something.
 * In [[[SCP-3934]]], MC&D play fetch with the Foundation using the Loch Ness Monster.
 * In [[[Parts]]], sacrifice is made apparent in the face of overwhelming good.


++++* Editor's Choice Articles

* [[[SCP-3009]]] ("Hi, I'm Your Snappelganger!") by Keyii - Wonderful characterization of lovable characters will have you attached to Stacey Lee quickly.
* [[[SCP-3758]]] ("The Last Dodo") by daveyoufool - A very predictable article until it very much isn't.
* [[[SCP-3844]]] ("To Slay a Dragon") by Captain Kirby - Science cannot truly kill whimsy.
* [[[SCP-4028]]] ("La Historia de Don Quixote de la Mancha") by The Great Hippo - Huge bias here, but I love Don Quixote and this meta-narrative is truly incredible.
* [[[SCP-4239]]] ("Project Kenowhere Central Volunteer Hub...") by scarhaver and Dolphinslugchugger - Pretty much a GAW 001 proposal.
* [[[SCP-4113]]] ("Long is the Way You Must Wander") by Doctor Cimmerian - Rule of cool reigns supreme here. Vikings, space, and lightsabers.
* [[[Inside the Wall]]] by Taylor Itkin - This is truly inspired and I highly suggest it.
* [[[Intermission]]] by tygently - I had no idea what Third Law was prior to this, but the article got me interested in exploring the canon.
* [[[ListPages Magic and You]]] by Croquembouche - The most helpful tool once could imagine for learning Listpages wizardy.



----
++++* SCP-4000 Contest
[[collapsible show="Click here to show the recap!" hide="Close"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp4000contesthub/Zhange4000labelled.jpg]]
= Banner by zhange
----
= [[size 250%]]**SCP-4000 Contest: Site News Edition!**[[/size]]
@@@@
The SCP-4000 contest was a blast! There were lots of really unique and interesting articles with cool twists on not just world history, but site and in-universe history. As good as many of them were, there could only be one SCP-4000. Folks, I present to you your winner!
----
[[div style="background-color: #fffff0; font-size: 150%; border: solid 1px #cc0000; border-radius: 10px; text-align: center; width: 400px; margin: 0 auto;"]]
Congratulations to
PeppersGhost
For winning the SCP-4000 Contest!
With: [[[SCP-4000 | Taboo]]]

[[/div]]

**##green|Taboo##** is a dark, twisted expansion on [[[scp-001-o5 | that time the Foundation committed genocide.]]] **##green|The contest winner##** has caused quite a stir within the community, with many people talking about it! Here are some notable creations!

* Do you have questions about SCP-4000? Well, look no further than [https://www.reddit.com/r/SCPDeclassified/comments/920z3u/scp4000_taboo_contest_entry/ r/SCPDeclassified on SCP-4000] and Doctor Cimmerian's [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=65ZOteo-Pvo Object Class Explained: SCP-4000.]
* Speaking of Doctor Cimmerian, he also narrated the article. [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lyFuSYbLtLc Check it out!]
* pastarasta1 made an SCP-4000-inspired animation. [http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/pastarasta1-s-simply-epic-artpage/taboo2 Here it is!]
* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4000-j SCP-4000-J], or '2boo' by djkaktus is a funnier take on SCP-4000!

= [[image http://www.scp-wiki.net/local--files/news-08-2018/PeppersGhostTaboo.jpg]]
= 'Taboo' by PeppersGhost!
= //"It's like a British public safety poster crossed with an Art Deco fever dream."// — Taffeta

----
[[div style="background-color: #fffff0; font-size: 150%; border: solid 1px #cc0000; border-radius: 10px; text-align: center; width: 800px; margin: 0 auto;"]]
But what's a contest without other competitors?
 Let's meet the other top contenders!
2nd: djkaktus with: [[[SCP-4444| Bush V. Gore]]]
3rd (tie): CadaverCommander with [[[SCP-4999| Someone To Watch Over Us]]]
3rd (tie): DrClef with [[[SCP-4960|Kedesh-Nanaya, Or: Why The Foundation Published Hentai to Awaken a Mesopotamian Love Goddess]]]
4th: IHP with [[[SCP-4100 |Future Imperfect]]]
5th: Mathbrush with [[[SCP-4500| Socratic Containment Procedures]]]

[[/div]]
----
= [[size 250%]]**Fun contest facts!**[[/size]]
@@@@
Here is a compilation of interesting facts on the contest, compiled by scpcrnp. Click [http://www.scp-wiki.net/forum/t-6744346/post-4k-contest-supplemental-awards-polls-and-misc-data here] for more!
* ihp posted the first entry (//"Future Imperfect"//) at 30 Jun 2018, 22:59.
* Peppersghost's //"Taboo"// received 100+ consecutive upvotes before receiving a downvote.
* PeppersGhost led for all but 47 hrs 35 min of the contest. The remainder was held by Ihp (//"Future Imperfect"//).
* 14 members posted their first works as a successful 4Kon entry:
> GentleGifts - //"Alexandria Eternal"//
> Researcher Blasko - //"Save Her"//
> higans - //"The Keepers"//
> Adriatica - //"The Day The Music Died"//
> EbenezerShark - //"The Last Question"//
> MacWarren - //"We Die In The Dark"//
> LuluTheRadiant - //"The World's Greatest Teacher Is History"//
> incidental_cabbage - //"History Is Written By The Victors"//
> DoctorNovakaine - //"Retrochronal Observation Tank"//
> Logarithmika- //"Saving Archimedes"//
> ArmLengthRadius - //"We Have Assumed Control"//
> Uncannyon - //"It Won't Stop Screaming"//
> Papa Sen - //"On Cowboys, Catholicism, and the Cretaceous"//
> Filayoung - //"Twenty Text Messages"//
* Modern_Erasmus and tretter's 4K entry, //"The Black Moon Howls From Beyond The Edge Of Time,"// was the final one posted, at 12AM on August 1st with 18 seconds left in the contest.
 * Additionally, it was the latest entrant to amass 100+ votes!
* //"Than Teach Ten Thousand Stars how Not to Dance"// by LordStonefish featured the most footnotes of any entry (28). Each of these is the same statement.
* Peppersghost made a version of //"Taboo"// for the colorblind.
* There were 3 new object classes introduced in the contest:
> djkaktus - "Ticonderoga" - //"Bush v. Gore"//
> higans - "Eparch" - //"The Keepers"//
> EbenezerShark - "Gödel" - //"The Last Last Question"//
* //"A Dream Come True"// by Communism will win and kinchtheknifeblade was the most discussed article in the contest with 190 comments.
* //"Kagemusha"// by weizhong received the best average score with a 95.8% positive rating.
* //"Bush v. Gore"// by djkaktus received the most net votes with a total of 525.
* 5 contest entries were co-written, including:
> Modern_Erasmus and tretter - //"The Black Moon Howls From Beyond The Edge Of Time"//
> Uncle Nicolini, SecretCrow, and Papa Sen - //"On Cowboys, Catholicism, and the Cretaceous"//  
> Communism will win and kinchtheknifeblade - //"A Dream Come True"//
> A Random Day and The Great Hippo - //"Dark Side of the Moon"//
> ArmLengthRadius and Gibberingeloquence - //"We Have Assumed Control"//

----
= [[size 250%]]**Editor's Picks!**[[/size]]
@@@@
Varaxous
> [[[SCP-4069|SCP-4069: Out of Range]]] by Cyantreuse is a pretty excellent read. Don't let the beginning fool you, this isn't a failed self-deletion. There's a lot going here, much of it deeper than it may seem. 100% worth a second read through, 200% worth reading through the follow up.
>
> [[[SCP-4999|SCP-4999: Someone to Watch Over us]]] by CadaverCommander. All I need to say about this one is that it's been a long time since I've read something and gotten chills because of it.
>
> [[[SCP-4017|SCP-4017: An Epilogue, Too Late to Matter]]] by 9Volt. There's a LOT of stuff here and all of it is extremely interesting. Exploring some aspects of Volt's own Second Hytoth, this piece really takes the 'History' theme to the max, exploring a lot of the Foundationverse through out. Warning: reading it may cause you to spend hours reading the other Church of the Second Hytoth articles.

Uncle Nicolini
> [[[scp-4007|SCP-4007: Kagemusha]]] by weizhong is by far my favorite article in the entire contest. It's expertly written and does everything to make you say 'Wait, what?' before the big reveal. I won't spoil it for you, so I highly encourage you to give it a read.
>
> A few other favorites of mine (in no particular order) are as follows;
> [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4444 SCP-4444: Bush v. Gore] by djkaktus
> [[[scp-4041|SCP-4041: Teach the Controversy]]] by Weryllium
> [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4999 SCP-4999: Someone to Watch Over Us] by CadaverCommander
> [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4004 SCP-4004: A Dream Come True] by Communism will win and kinchtheknifeblade
> [[[scp-4300|SCP-4300: To Lose One's Soul]]] by Bluedanoob.
> [[[scp-4890|SCP-4890: Dr. Wondertainment's Guide to History]]] by Baronjoe

----

= [[size 75%]]**Thank you.**
Thanks toTSATPWTCOTTTADC, PeppersGhost, and Varaxous for helping out during the creation of the 4kcon recap.
[[/size]]
[[/collapsible]]




[[f>toc]]

----

You will notice little '📈' emojis besides some articles. That denotes SCP articles which were under 30 and tales which were under 20 when this edition of site news was posted. Give them a little love! Speaking from personal experience, the most frustrating thing that can happen to an article is not deletion, but stagnating below 20 without any comments. So try to read, vote, and comment on these articles! They're often hidden gems :)

+++ Week of August 1st:


++++ SCPs

* 📈 [[[scp-3735| SCP-3735]]] ("ForbiddeN SouNd") - A letter lost to time, forgotten by the few, known to the chosen. Written by isaacmayer9.
* 📈 [[[scp-3537| SCP-3537]]] ("Mr. Shapey") - A mold from which the others came pouring out. Written by Dramps.
* 📈 [[[scp-3745| SCP-3745]]] ("As the Heart Breaks, so do the Heavens") - Our love will never fade, bound through bone until the end. Written by Wildman8.
* [[[scp-3865| SCP-3865]]] ("You Reap What You Sow") - THE CORN, you fool, THE CORN HOLDS THE KEY TO ANOTHER WORLD! Written by Wildman8.
* 📈 [[[scp-2601| SCP-2601]]] ("They Say You Die Twice") - //"SCP-2601 is an unstable equilibrium of antimemetic and infocaustic phenomena which combine to form an extremely potent, slow-progressing, biologically bound infophage."// Written by amnestic_protocol.
* [[[scp-1750| SCP-1750]]] ("Jurassic Park") - Life in the fast lane, uh... finds a way. Written by A Random Day.
* [[[scp-3758| SCP-3758]]] ("The Last Dodo") - Extinction has an awful side effect of releasing abominations - such as the dodo. Written by daveyoufool.
* [[[scp-3382| SCP-3382]]] ("Ill Wishes") - Only the sick may have their wish come true. Written by Wazikamawata.
* [[[scp-3009| SCP-3009]]] ("Hi, I'm Your Snappelganger!") - //"At this time, the Foundation is not able to determine whether one, both, or neither of subjects is the real Stacey Lee."// Written by keyii.
* 📈 [[[scp-3472| SCP-3472]]] ("Mother Loves her Baby") - And she will let no harm befall her baby under any circumstances. Written by UraniumEmpire.
* 📈 [[[scp-3628| SCP-3628]]] ("Better Not to Know") - Knowledge is a burden to be carried by the strong, even in the face of death's ticking clock. Written by amnestic_protocol.
* 📈 [[[scp-3560-j| SCP-3560-J]]] - //"No, no, NO! When will you imbeciles learn?! The milk goes in BEFORE the tea!"// Written by Alan Stock.
* 📈 [[[scp-3507| SCP-3507]]] ("Father, This Day I Bring You True Glory") - It is one thing to do good things for recognition. It is another thing to do goods things for they are good. Written by Azmoeth Jikandia.
* [[[scp-2758| SCP-2758]]] ("Self-Containment Process") - //"42? I was hoping I'd end up in 19. I haven't even heard of Site-42."// Written by Cyantreuse.
* [[[scp-3352| SCP-3352]]] ("My Better Half") - //"Half a man tries to find his better half"// Written by HumidHermit.
* [[[weryllium-proposal| Dr. Palanez's Proposal]]] - The one true canon proposal. Written by Weryllium.

++++ Tales

* 📈 [[[a-pound-of-flesh-a-piece-of-meat| A Pound Of Flesh, A Piece Of Meat]]] - //"I have your sacrifice, and I wish for the Flesh of a Dead God."// Written by DrChandra.
* 📈 [[[insomnia| Insomnia]]] - To the short-sighted, dreams are nothing but that.  Written by Arkaynd.
* [[[the-great-gig-in-the-sky| The Great Gig In The Sky]]] - Just the small, inconspicuous town of Darringtion, North Carolina. Written by The Great Hippo.
* [[[i-am-wonderful| I Am Wonderful]]] - There is a Doctor Behind the Wonder. Written by Captain Kirby.
* [[[dog-man| Dog Man]]] - What's it with you and making things with teeth terrifying? Written by Dr Gears.
* [[[cured-hams| Cured Hams]]] - The Old Man and the Plague Doctor get together for a lovely dinner. Written by Uncle Nicolini.
* 📈 [[[i-dreamed-a-dream| I Dreamed a Dream]]] - //""And that's how I single-handedly defeated and destroyed the large, lengthy, luminescent Moon Lizard using the sacred Moon Saber!" proclaimed Moon Champion"// Written by Elogee FishTruck.
* [[[tim-wilson-s-close-shave| Tim Wilson's Close Shave]]] - Tim Wilson has a close encounter with the Children of the Night. Written by Uncle Nicolini.
* [[[us-and-them| Us and Them]]] - //"It feels good. Like she's doing something useful. Something that isn't violent, illegal, or both."// Written by The Great Hippo.
* 📈 [[[working-man| Working Man]]] - Just your normal, everyday, Factory worker. Written by Baronjoe.
* 📈 [[[afterlife| Afterlife]]] - //"And so it makes little difference to him when the Sothists cut it off…"// Written by AFX Neuromancer.
* [[[the-bowels-of-history| The Bowels of History]]] - //"Tess digs into her stomach and finds extraterrestrial arachnids in her spacetime."// Written by faminepulse.

++++ GOI Formats


* [[[maya-the-magnificent| Herman Fuller Presents: Maya the Magnificent]]] - [[http://www.scp-wiki.net/herman-fuller-hub Herman Fuller]] Fuller creates a monster even he can't tame. Written by SecretCrow.
* [[[critter-profile-maya| Critter Profile: Maya!]]] - [[http://www.scp-wiki.net/wilson-s-wildlife-solutions-hub Wilson's Wildlife]] Maya the Magnificent finds peace and kicks her smoking habit. Written by Uncle Nicolini.

++++ Misc

* [[[all-that-glisters| All That Glisters]]] - What do you get for the men who have it all? The answer lies not in the physical, but the magical. Written by DrChandra.
* [[[dark-side-hub| Dark Side Discography]]] - //"A tale series about the Foundation, its sinister dark-side doppelganger, eclipses (literal and figurative), witches, faeries (literal and figurative), the women's restroom of the Philadelphia Public Library, and four teenagers running for their lives."// Written by The Great Hippo.

Written by scarhaver and DolphinSlugchugger.

+++ Fanart



* The prolific artist DrShine now has [[[drshine-art-page|an artwork page]]] on the wiki. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-DrShine-Thumbnails.png link="drshine-art-page"]] _
DrShine is working on an ambitious original comic. Check that art page often to see new pages.
----
* SunnyClockwork has new art for SCP-3448 ("Halfterlife"), SCP-3718 ("An Environmental Cat-astrophe"), and SCP-4500 ("Socratic Containment Procedures") on the [[[sunny-art-series-4|]]] page. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-SunnyClockwork-Thumbnails.png link="sunny-art-series-4"]].
----
* Artist Amamy makes very detailed paintings of SCPs, often of SCP-049. This month's take on SCP-049 is a celebration of the article's rewrite and can be seen [http://amamy992.tumblr.com on Amamy's Tumblr]. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-Amamy-Thumbnails.png link="http://amamy992.tumblr.com/post/176734750652/scp-049rewritemore-scp-049-plague-doctor"]]
----
* DrSSS recently made very charming [[[goi-ball-comics|GOI Ball (page by SunnyClockwork)]]] style illustrations representing the different international SCP branches featuring iconic articles from those branches: _
[[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/jp.png]] [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/art/JP-Ball-SCP-040-JP-760288733 SCP-040-JP] | [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/fr.png]] [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/art/FR-Ball-SCP-236-FR-760150544 SCP-236-FR] | [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/us.png]] [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/art/EN-Ball-SCP-173-760149214 SCP-173] | [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/cn.png]] [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/art/CN-Ball-SCP-CN-994-760146934 SCP-CN-994] | [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/th.png]] [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/art/TH-Ball-SCP-901-TH-760146651 SCP-901-TH] | [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/de.png]] [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/art/DE-Ball-SCP-055-DE-J-760146113 SCP-055-DE-J] | [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/es.png]] [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/art/ES-Ball-SCP-ES-004-760145699 SCP-ES-004] | [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/kr.png]] [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/art/KO-Ball-SCP-340-KO-760145061 SCP-340-KO] _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-DrSSS-Thumbnails.png link="https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/"]] _
The [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/ International Translation Archive] has English translations for most of the featured articles. _
 _
You can see more of DrSSS's recent artwork on [https://www.deviantart.com/maxalate/gallery/?catpath=/ their DeviantArt page] or check out their newly revamped artwork page on the wiki - [[[maxalate-s-artwork-series-1|]]]. _
 _
Also take a look at the new and quickly growing [https://www.reddit.com/r/scp_ball/ r/SCP_Ball subreddit] for more original GOI Ball style content such as DrAnnoyingDog's [https://www.reddit.com/r/scp_ball/search?q=author%3ADrZedHunter&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&feature=legacy_search series involving the Wilson's Wildlife Solutions Group of Interest].
----
* pastarasta1 has added **80** new works to their art page in August, including many illustrations of SCPs from the international branches. On [[[pastarasta1-s-simply-epic-artpage|his art page]]] - everything from SCP-1824-JP and on is brand new this month. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-pastarasta1-Thumbnails.png link="pastarasta1-s-simply-epic-artpage"]]
----
* [https://d-stroart.tumblr.com/tagged/scp D-Stro] is another artist who is inspired by SCPs in other languages. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-D-Stro-Thumbnails.png link="https://d-stroart.tumblr.com/post/176927329355/foreign-scp-branches-need-love-too-c-this-ones"]]
----
* [https://mustakettu.tumblr.com/tagged/scp Mustakettu] - an artist who started uploading SCP images only this month already has a great gallery of them. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-Mustakettu-Thumbnails.png link="https://mustakettu.tumblr.com/tagged/scp"]]
----
* [https://robyrn-the-artist.tumblr.com Rosemary Byrne] does absolutely charming pastel colored portraits of SCPs and researchers and some great comic strips featuring them. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-Rosemary-Byrne-Thumbnails.png link="https://robyrn-the-artist.tumblr.com"]]
----
* [http://nikkoleon.tumblr.com/tagged/SCP Nikkoleon] makes lots of SCP art - single panel funnies, dark moody illustrations, and these colorful portraits full of personality meant to be used as avatar images. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-Nikkoleon-Thumbnails.png link="http://nikkoleon.tumblr.com/post/177509811465/heres-the-entire-set-of-free-to-use-scp-avatars"]]
----
* SCP-173 is a popular subject for sculpting projects. Check out this [https://cyanide-moron.tumblr.com/post/177271872995/smol-peanut "smol peanut" by cyanide-moron]. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-cyanide-moron-Thumbnails.png link="https://cyanide-moron.tumblr.com/post/177271872995/smol-peanut"]]

+++* Some Excellent YouTube Content Out This Month

* Zhange, one of the wiki's major artists, has started a YouTube channel and her first upload is [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KvS9asVJ1Fk a speedpaint of her colossal Groups of Interest painting] that she made for SCP's 11th birthday earlier this year. If you are not familiar with Zhange's work - check out [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/zhange-artwork her art page]. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-Zhange-Thumbnails.png link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KvS9asVJ1Fk"]]
----
* [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz80pinf9hc6qpiqkkN9OgQ Glenn Leroi] has been making catchy SCP inspired songs for over 6 years. This month they released [https://youtu.be/2SwKjxUl1HQ a song called "Nine Tailed Fox"] about the Mobile Task Force that handles the Foundation's internal security. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-Glenn-Leroi-Thumbnails.png link="https://youtu.be/2SwKjxUl1HQ"]]
----
[[# 3999]]
* Youtube channel [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCusmVWZDtC88zI_NK2XNUA Synthetic Alien] often goes above and beyond for their SCP readings. One of their new releases this month is [https://youtu.be/Z6hSeCh0dCQ a 34 minute video on SCP-3999] that includes live action sections, contributions from other youtubers, and fantastic editing. It is more movie adaptation than simple reading. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-Synthetic-Alien-Thumbnails.png link="https://youtu.be/Z6hSeCh0dCQ"]]
----
* Another large ambitious work is [https://youtu.be/wZ1AqwgjlvQ this 40 minute long SCP mockumentary machinima] from [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC34ZKAM8ZcDqGtvLYj8HJAQ Toast] made using the SCP: Secret Laboratory game. _
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-08-2018/SCP-News-2018-08-Toast-Thumbnails.png link="https://youtu.be/wZ1AqwgjlvQ"]]
----
* More and more popular lore overview YouTube channels are starting to produce well researched videos that serve as good introductions to specific aspects of SCP lore and SCP in general.
 * Here is [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb6IaF9LX5KlUXQqHFq2xbg LifesBiggestQuestions]' first batch of SCP videos, new this month: _
[https://youtu.be/BUhNy2zhOVs 📰 What If The SCP Foundation Was Real?] _
[https://youtu.be/waApePTdW2o ☢️ What Are The Most Dangerous SCP Foundation Creatures?] _
[https://youtu.be/cO-a-PPTCo4 💥 What If The SCP Foundation Was Breached?] _
[https://youtu.be/hO3lTkuiC_M 🕵️What Is The SCP Foundation Hiding From Us?] _
[https://youtu.be/aiWiv9yjBYg 💾 What If The SCP – 2000 Was Real?]
 * And here are a few from [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYyWrpcVU2PZlLohFaYOZUw The Exploring Series]: _
[https://youtu.be/R9hv6NsWndM 🆕 Introduction to the Foundation] _
[https://youtu.be/wASyJKi1Bq4 ⚙️ The Church of the Broken God] _
[https://youtu.be/wMyGplAEefM 🔝 SCP-001] _
[https://youtu.be/TD9IQh4OVaI 🎩 Dr. Wondertainment] _
These videos all go in depth on their topics - you might learn something new about your favorite Group of Interest or SCP.
----
* And just for fun - [https://youtu.be/J5nNztvkdvA here is a short animation] based on an outtake from a Tats TopVideos video. Tats TopVideos' SCP lists are responsible for introducing many of the current readers and writers to SCP in the first place. [http://www.youtube.com/user/CyberGothTatsumaki/ The venerable YouTube channel] is still going strong, releasing well produced SCP videos every few months.
